segments.text: Lucy , you ’ re back . How was your first day of school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was great . I had a really good time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What classes did you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I had English from 9 o'clock to 11 o'clock , art from 12 o'clock to 2 o'clock , and math from 2 o'clock to 4 o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think about the teachers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I liked all of them , except for the math teacher . Though he must be quite young , he seem like an old person . He ’ s so boring !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s too bad . How was your English teacher ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She was great . In today ’ s class , she gave us a lecture on how to be a good student . She told us not to arm for exams , and to pay more attention on communicating than memorizing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where is she from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She said that she ’ s from a small town in the middle of America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Were you able to understand everything that she said ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not everything , but nearly . She speaks very clearly and doesn ’ t use very complex words so that it is easy for us to understand her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She sounds like a good teacher . Do you think you ’ ll pass her class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ... with flying colors !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does that mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a new phrase that she taught us today . It means that I will not only pass the class , but I will do extremely well !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you like the class this much already , I ’ m sure you will .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: did she give you any homework ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not today . She said she wanted us to relax tonight instead of doing homework ,
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no wonder you like the class so much .
segments.speaker: S1
